arts.ttl: Serie A | Parma 2-1 Monza: Match Report
arts.sum: Monza experienced a heartbreaking 2-1 loss to Parma in a match that marked Salvatore Bocchetti's debut as head coach. Despite being reduced to 10 men, Monza fought valiantly but ultimately succumbed to a last-minute goal. The post Serie A | Parma 2-1 Monza: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Parma v Monza: Probable starting lineups
arts.sum: Parma's defensive crisis deepens as they prepare to face Monza in Serie A on Saturday afternoon. The Crociati could be missing up to half of their regular back four, with Enrico Del Prato and Emanuele Valeri both sustaining injuries in last week's defeat to Roma. While Valeri might still feature, Del Prato's thigh problem is likely to keep him sidelined. The post Serie A | Parma v Monza: Probable starting lineups appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Parma boss Pecchia: “It’s clear, this squad needs reinforcement”
arts.sum: Ahead of Parma's upcoming match against Monza, head coach Fabio Pecchia held a press conference to discuss the team's situation and the January transfer market. With the club looking to strengthen its squad, Pecchia emphasized the need for reinforcements. The post Parma boss Pecchia: “It’s clear, this squad needs reinforcement” appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Vieira: “Empoli, Lecce, and Parma are crucial matches. We are growing”
arts.sum: Speaking in a press conference, Genoa head coach Patrick Vieira discussed the upcoming challenges for his team, emphasizing the importance of their next matches against Empoli, Lecce, and Parma. The post Vieira: “Empoli, Lecce, and Parma are crucial matches. We are growing” appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Parma vs. Monza as a fight for survival
arts.sum: Considering Serie B, Parma have remained unbeaten in their last six matches against Monza (W1 D5), the last success of the Brianza team against the Emilians in the championship dates to 24th March 1985 (3-0). Parma are, together with Monza, one of only two teams yet to have kept a clean sheet in home games in this championship.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Parma v Monza: Match Preview
arts.sum: As 2024 comes to an end, Parma and Monza prepare to face off in a pivotal Serie A encounter at the Stadio Ennio Tardini on Saturday afternoon. Both sides enter the match looking to climb out of the relegation zone, with Parma sitting 15th and Monza languishing at the bottom of the table.
